question: Which Indian armed force has launched OASIS (Officers Automated & Structured Information System) software?
explanation: The Indian Army has launched its new software OASIS (Officers Automated & Structured Information System) that has started digitizing the records of the Army officers. The new software is hosted on Armyâ€™s intranet and can be accessed by the Army officers to check their details. The OASIS will facilitate officers to view service records & raise observations. It also view & download monthly Statements of Accounts, Form-16 & DSOP Fund statements.
